title: Travis CI: test_high_characters sometimes fails

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Any unexpected behavior, until confirmed feature.

body:
I've seen it fail on some Docker build jobs. After rebuilding, it was fine.

Here's an example from DOCKER="debian-stretch-x86" from today at https://travis-ci.org/python-pillow/Pillow/jobs/279047420, which passed after rebuilding:
```
======================================================================
FAIL: TestFontPcf.test_high_characters
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Pillow/Tests/test_font_pcf.py", line 59, in test_high_characters
    self._test_high_characters(message)
  File "/Pillow/Tests/test_font_pcf.py", line 55, in _test_high_characters
    self.assert_image_equal(image, compare)
  File "/Pillow/Tests/helper.py", line 85, in assert_image_equal
    msg or "got size %r, expected %r" % (a.size, b.size))
AssertionError: got size (783, 22), expected (765, 22)
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
PIL.PngImagePlugin: DEBUG: STREAM 'IHDR' 16 13
PIL.PngImagePlugin: DEBUG: STREAM 'IDAT' 41 2644
PIL.PngImagePlugin: DEBUG: STREAM 'IHDR' 16 13
PIL.PngImagePlugin: DEBUG: STREAM 'IDAT' 41 1400
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 1068 tests in 16.060s
FAILED (SKIP=25, failures=1)
```

---

Here's another from August (https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/pull/2634#issuecomment-322232953):

> I'm not sure what's up with the Travis errors, as they're non-deterministic. This fails on debian-stretch in one commit or ubuntu-trusty-x86 in another, but the changes should not affect them.
```
======================================================================
FAIL: TestFontPcf.test_high_characters
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Pillow/Tests/test_font_pcf.py", line 59, in test_high_characters
    self._test_high_characters(message)
  File "/Pillow/Tests/test_font_pcf.py", line 55, in _test_high_characters
    self.assert_image_equal(image, compare)
  File "/Pillow/Tests/helper.py", line 85, in assert_image_equal
    msg or "got size %r, expected %r" % (a.size, b.size))
AssertionError: got size (770, 22), expected (765, 22)
```
> (and when rerun, the ubuntu version passed, and the debian one still failed)
